title: Leaverbuster Plague
body: So hundreds of people have to wait 10-20 minutes (1/4 - 1/2 a game) because of an issue with YOUR client? Directx error happens if you try to play the game at a different resolution, would love an explanation on this one. {{item:2050}}

replies.body: We did notice a lot of players were having some weird DirectX crashes and 1/4 screen window bugs, which should have all been cleared up when we rolled out the patch for it yesterday. If you were hit with a leaver buster from that issue, I'd suggest hitting us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a look at what all happened.
